keywords: ['rock', 'wide mellow high pitched synth pad', 'relaxing', 'calming', 'toms roll', 'intro', 'punchy drums', 'smooth electric guitar', 'smooth bass guitar']
caption: The Rock song features a wide, mellow, high pitched synth pad swelling into the drop that consists of punchy drums, smooth electric and bass guitars. Right before the "drop", there is a short toms roll. It sounds calming and relaxing, at least until the bass drops.
